price: Also remember Ishmael, Elisha, and Dhul-Kifl[20] – all were among the best.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ إِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَٱلۡيَسَعَ وَذَا ٱلۡكِفۡلِۖ وَكُلّٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَخۡيَارِ
footnotes: [20] Scholars are of different opinions as to whether Dhul-Kifl was a prophet or only a righteous man.
